verses.verse: וַיִּקְרְב֥וּ <S%H7126><s%> drew nigh יְמֵֽי־ <S%H3117><s%> Now the days דָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> of David לָמ֑וּת <S%H4191><s%> that he should die וַיְצַ֛ו <S%H6680><s%> and he charged אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁלֹמֹ֥ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon בְנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

אָנֹכִ֣י <S%H595><s%> I הֹלֵ֔ךְ <S%H1980><s%> I go בְּדֶ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> the way כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of all the earth וְחָזַקְתָּ֖ <S%H2388><s%> be thou strong וְהָיִ֥יתָֽ <S%H1961><s%> and show לְאִֽישׁ׃ <S%H376><s%> therefore and shew thyself a man

וְשָׁמַרְתָּ֞ <S%H8104><s%> And keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁמֶ֣רֶת ׀ <S%H4931><s%> the charge יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God לָלֶ֤כֶת <S%H1980><s%> to walk בִּדְרָכָיו֙ <S%H1870><s%> in his ways לִשְׁמֹ֨ר <S%H8104><s%> to keep חֻקֹּתָ֤יו <S%H2708><s%> his statutes מִצְוֹתָיו֙ <S%H4687><s%> and his commandments וּמִשְׁפָּטָ֣יו <S%H4941><s%> and his judgments וְעֵדְוֹתָ֔יו <S%H5715><s%> and his testimonies כַּכָּת֖וּב <S%H3789><s%> as it is written בְּתוֹרַ֣ת <S%H8451><s%> in the law מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> of Moses לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> that תַּשְׂכִּ֗יל <S%H7919><s%> that thou mayest prosper אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> you תַּֽעֲשֶׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> in all that thou doest וְאֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> you תִּפְנֶ֖ה <S%H6437><s%> and whithersoever thou turnest שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> in it

לְמַעַן֩ <S%H4616><s%> so יָקִ֨ים <S%H6965><s%> may continue יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> That the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּבָר֗וֹ <S%H1697><s%> his word אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> which he spake עָלַי֮ <S%H5921><s%> concerning לֵאמֹר֒ <S%H559><s%> concerning me saying אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If יִשְׁמְר֨וּ <S%H8104><s%> take heed בָנֶ֜יךָ <S%H1121><s%> If thy children אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דַּרְכָּ֗ם <S%H1870><s%> to their way לָלֶ֤כֶת <S%H1980><s%> to walk לְפָנַי֙ <S%H6440><s%> before בֶּאֱמֶ֔ת <S%H571><s%> me in truth בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all לְבָבָ֖ם <S%H3824><s%> with all their heart וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all נַפְשָׁ֑ם <S%H5315><s%> and with all their soul לֵאמֹ֕ר <S%H559><s%> thee (said לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not יִכָּרֵ֤ת <S%H3772><s%> there shall not fail לְךָ֙ אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> he) a man מֵעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> concerning כִּסֵּ֥א <S%H3678><s%> on the throne יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וְגַ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> also אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you יָדַ֡עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> Moreover thou knowest אֵת֩ <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> what עָ֨שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> did לִ֜י יוֹאָ֣ב <S%H3097><s%> also what Joab בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son צְרוּיָ֗ה <S%H6870><s%> of Zeruiah אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> what עָשָׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> to me [and] what he did לִשְׁנֵֽי־ <S%H8147><s%> to the two שָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> captains צִבְא֣וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of the hosts יִ֠שְׂרָאֵל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לְאַבְנֵ֨ר <S%H74><s%> unto Abner בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נֵ֜ר <S%H5369><s%> of Ner וְלַעֲמָשָׂ֤א <S%H6021><s%> and unto Amasa בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יֶ֙תֶר֙ <S%H3500><s%> of Jether וַיַּ֣הַרְגֵ֔ם <S%H2026><s%> whom he slew וַיָּ֥שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> and shed דְּמֵֽי־ <S%H1818><s%> the blood מִלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> of war בְּשָׁלֹ֑ם <S%H7965><s%> in peace וַיִּתֵּ֞ן <S%H5414><s%> and put דְּמֵ֣י <S%H1818><s%> the blood מִלְחָמָ֗ה <S%H4421><s%> of war בַּחֲגֹֽרָתוֹ֙ <S%H2290><s%> upon his girdle אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> what בְּמָתְנָ֔יו <S%H4975><s%> that [was] about his loins וּֽבְנַעֲל֖וֹ <S%H5275><s%> and in his shoes אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> what בְּרַגְלָֽיו׃ <S%H7272><s%> that [were] on his feet

וְעָשִׂ֖יתָ <S%H6213><s%> Do כְּחָכְמָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H2451><s%> therefore according to thy wisdom וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תוֹרֵ֧ד <S%H3381><s%> go down שֵׂיבָת֛וֹ <S%H7872><s%> and let not his hoar head בְּשָׁלֹ֖ם <S%H7965><s%> in peace שְׁאֹֽל׃ <S%H7585><s%> to the grave ס

וְלִבְנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> unto the sons בַרְזִלַּ֤י <S%H1271><s%> of Barzillai הַגִּלְעָדִי֙ <S%H1569><s%> the Gileadite תַּֽעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> But shew חֶ֔סֶד <S%H2617><s%> kindness וְהָי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> become בְּאֹכְלֵ֣י <S%H398><s%> and let them be of those that eat שֻׁלְחָנֶ֑ךָ <S%H7979><s%> at thy table כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for כֵן֙ <S%H3651><s%> after that קָרְב֣וּ <S%H7126><s%> for so they came אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> about בְּבָרְחִ֕י <S%H1272><s%> to me when I fled מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> because אַבְשָׁל֥וֹם <S%H53><s%> of Absalom אָחִֽיךָ׃ <S%H251><s%> thy brother

וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold עִ֠מְּךָ <S%H5973><s%> you שִֽׁמְעִ֨י <S%H8096><s%> And behold [thou hast] with thee Shimei בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son גֵּרָ֥א <S%H1617><s%> of Gera בֶן־ הַיְמִינִי֮ <S%H1145><s%> a Benjamite מִבַּחֻרִים֒ <S%H980><s%> of Bahurim וְה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> who קִֽלְלַ֙נִי֙ <S%H7043><s%> which cursed קְלָלָ֣ה <S%H7045><s%> curse נִמְרֶ֔צֶת <S%H4834><s%> me with a grievous בְּי֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day לֶכְתִּ֣י <S%H1980><s%> went מַחֲנָ֑יִם <S%H4266><s%> to Mahanaim וְהֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> he יָרַ֤ד <S%H3381><s%> but he came down לִקְרָאתִי֙ <S%H7125><s%> to meet הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <S%H3383><s%> me at Jordan וָאֶשָּׁ֨בַֽע <S%H7650><s%> and I sware ל֤וֹ בַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> to him by the LORD לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying אִם־ <S%H518><s%> I will not אֲמִֽיתְךָ֖ <S%H4191><s%> I will not put thee to death בֶּחָֽרֶב׃ <S%H2719><s%> with the sword

וְעַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> Now אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תְּנַקֵּ֔הוּ <S%H5352><s%> Now therefore hold him not guiltless כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man חָכָ֖ם <S%H2450><s%> for thou [art] a wise אָ֑תָּה <S%H859><s%> and you וְיָֽדַעְתָּ֙ <S%H3045><s%> and knowest אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> what תַּֽעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> what thou oughtest to do לּ֔וֹ וְהוֹרַדְתָּ֧ <S%H3381><s%> bring thou down אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵׂיבָת֛וֹ <S%H7872><s%> unto him but his hoar head בְּדָ֖ם <S%H1818><s%> with blood שְׁאֽוֹל׃ <S%H7585><s%> to the grave

וַיִּשְׁכַּ֥ב <S%H7901><s%> slept דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> So David עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֲבֹתָ֑יו <S%H1><s%> with his fathers וַיִּקָּבֵ֖ר <S%H6912><s%> and was buried בְּעִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> in the city דָּוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> of David פ

וְהַיָּמִ֗ים <S%H3117><s%> And the days אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after מָלַ֤ךְ <S%H4427><s%> reigned דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> that David עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> over Israel אַרְבָּעִ֖ים <S%H705><s%> [were] forty שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years בְּחֶבְר֤וֹן <S%H2275><s%> he in Hebron מָלַךְ֙ <S%H4427><s%> reigned שֶׁ֣בַע <S%H7651><s%> seven שָׁנִ֔ים <S%H8141><s%> years וּבִירוּשָׁלִַ֣ם <S%H3389><s%> he in Jerusalem מָלַ֔ךְ <S%H4427><s%> reigned שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> and thirty וְשָׁלֹ֖שׁ <S%H7969><s%> and three שָׁנִֽים׃ <S%H8141><s%> years

וּשְׁלֹמֹ֕ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon יָשַׁ֕ב <S%H3427><s%> Then sat עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כִּסֵּ֖א <S%H3678><s%> upon the throne דָּוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> of David אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> his father וַתִּכֹּ֥ן <S%H3559><s%> was established מַלְכֻת֖וֹ <S%H4428><s%> king מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> greatly

וַיָּבֹ֞א <S%H935><s%> came אֲדֹנִיָּ֣הוּ <S%H138><s%> And Adonijah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חַגֵּ֗ית <S%H2294><s%> of Haggith אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בַּת־ שֶׁ֙בַע֙ <S%H1339><s%> to Bathsheba אֵם־ <S%H517><s%> the mother שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <S%H8010><s%> of Solomon וַתֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And she said הֲשָׁל֣וֹם <S%H7965><s%> Peaceably בֹּאֶ֑ךָ <S%H935><s%> Comest וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H7965><s%> Peacefully
וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> He said דָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> moreover I have somewhat to say לִ֖י אֵלָ֑יִךְ <S%H413><s%> about וַתֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> unto thee And she said דַּבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> Say on

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אַ֤תְּ <S%H859><s%> You יָדַ֙עַתְּ֙ <S%H3045><s%> Thou knowest כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לִי֙ הָיְתָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> and become הַמְּלוּכָ֔ה <S%H4410><s%> that the kingdom וְעָלַ֞י <S%H5921><s%> and שָׂ֧מוּ <S%H7760><s%> set כָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> was mine and [that] all Israel פְּנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H6440><s%> their faces לִמְלֹ֑ךְ <S%H4427><s%> on me that I should reign וַתִּסֹּ֤ב <S%H5437><s%> is turned about הַמְּלוּכָה֙ <S%H4410><s%> howbeit the kingdom וַתְּהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> and become לְאָחִ֔י <S%H251><s%> and is become my brother's כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for מֵיְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> for it was his from the LORD הָ֥יְתָה <S%H1961><s%> and become לּֽוֹ׃

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> Now שְׁאֵלָ֤ה <S%H7596><s%> petition אַחַת֙ <S%H259><s%> one אָֽנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> I שֹׁאֵ֣ל <S%H7592><s%> And now I ask מֵֽאִתָּ֔ךְ <S%H853><s%> אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תָּשִׁ֖בִי <S%H7725><s%> of thee deny אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פָּנָ֑י <S%H6440><s%> me וַתֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> not And she said אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> to him דַּבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> unto him Say on

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אִמְרִי־ <S%H559><s%> Speak נָא֙ <S%H4994><s%> Please לִשְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <S%H8010><s%> I pray thee unto Solomon הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> he will not יָשִׁ֖יב <S%H7725><s%> nay אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פָּנָ֑יִךְ <S%H6440><s%> thee וְיִתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> ) that he give לִ֛י אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲבִישַׁ֥ג <S%H49><s%> me Abishag הַשּׁוּנַמִּ֖ית <S%H7767><s%> the Shunammite לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> to wife

וַתֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said בַּת־ שֶׁ֖בַע <S%H1339><s%> And Bathsheba ט֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Well אָנֹכִ֕י <S%H595><s%> I אֲדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> I will speak עָלֶ֖יךָ <S%H5921><s%> and אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> for thee unto the king

וַתָּבֹ֤א <S%H935><s%> therefore went בַת־ שֶׁ֙בַע֙ <S%H1339><s%> Bathsheba אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto king שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon לְדַבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> to speak ל֖וֹ עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto אֲדֹנִיָּ֑הוּ <S%H138><s%> unto him for Adonijah וַיָּקָם֩ <S%H6965><s%> rose up הַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king לִקְרָאתָ֜הּ <S%H7125><s%> to meet וַיִּשְׁתַּ֣חוּ <S%H7812><s%> her and bowed לָ֗הּ וַיֵּ֙שֶׁב֙ <S%H3427><s%> himself unto her and sat down עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כִּסְא֔וֹ <S%H3678><s%> on his throne וַיָּ֤שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> to be set כִּסֵּא֙ <S%H3678><s%> and caused a seat לְאֵ֣ם <S%H517><s%> mother הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> for the king's וַתֵּ֖שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> and she sat לִֽימִינֽוֹ׃ <S%H3225><s%> on his right hand
